description: First group project. We were tasked with creating a responsive app using a new css library, and new API's. We created a horoscope of the day app that translated your daily horoscope into how yoda will speak. It all worked together except for the yoda translater not being able to perfectly translate complex sentences.

Homework week 5. For this assignment, we needed to create our own app to save things to do throughout the day in local storage. it also shows, using color, what time block you are currently in and what was past and is in the future.

Homework week 19. For this assignment, we were tasked with creating a react app that takes an array of objects from a random user generator and create a table that can be sorted and filtered. Works like a directory for your employees. My app can sort the employees by gender, last name, and can filter out anyone under 10 years of experience.

Group project 2. For this we were tasked with creating a full stack application using npm packages as well as CRUD functionality and database usage. We created an app for consumers that want to keep track and log down there plants and the growth of them. Although there are some stuff added in that is not fully usable, we added a way to upload photos of your plants as well to be saved and brought up again.

HomeWork week 9. We needed to create an app that takes user inputs and creates a readme.md file for your projects. It has been very useful to myself in making readme's for my homeworks. Using Node and inquirer, it takes in inputs for things like: titles, usage info, guidelines, testing, github profile, etc.
location: This must be cloned and run on local as it was made before we were taught about creating full stack apps to connect everything with. will be updated if the full app is done.
